title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a city street with moderate traffic.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.0 m/s). There are 6 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with parked cars on the side. There are several traffic lights and street signs. The weather is clear and sunny. The video shows a few cars driving in the opposite direction and a pedestrian crossing the street.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed and keeps a safe distance from other vehicles. It slows down when approaching a traffic light and changes lanes when necessary. The driver is cautious and pays attention to pedestrians and other potential hazards.
